title: Gta4 crack.Clear-by Maximo
description:
MaXimo Presents :: GTA 4 Working Crack


Instructions:

1.Overwrite LaunchGTAIV.exe from the game folder with the one in the Maximo.gta4crack.rar

2.Copy paul.dll where you have instaled the game.

3.Now Disable your internet connection.

4.Now enter the Rockstar Games Social Club (RGSCLauncher.exe)

5.Press Skip Login, then press PLAY.

6.To save the game you have to create an account of Windows Live (offline account).

7.After you created your account you can save the game by sleeping in the bed, pressing "F".

8.Enjoy and play!


For the moment it's not a stable crack version but if you follow my steps it will work 100%!!!!

It's not a fake crack!!!Just follow the steps and it will work !!!

Peace.

No more game bugs, no drunk camera, no car bug.
